meanings: (잠깐) in an instant, in a flash, (문득) by chance, by accident, unexpectedly

vlive.korean: 일단 언뜻 보기엔 별 차이 없어보이지 않아요? Well, they look similar. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [MXM] 고난과 역경을 딛고 최고의맛을 낸 영동이들의 슈퍼새해 떡국🍲❤️ (MXM cooking tteokguk)
언뜻 느낌적인 느낌? Just a little part of me? 듣기 View video JBJ : 젭제는 배가고픕니다 그래서..
vlive.english: Just a little part of me?

vlive.korean: 언뜻 들어봤었던 것 같아요. - 언뜻. I heard it when I was young. - When you were young. 듣기 View video OH MY GIRL : [REPLAY] OH MY GIRL SUMMER PARTY "내 얘길 들어봐"
vlive.english: I heard it when I was young. - When you were young.

vlive.korean: 제가 언뜻 소문을 들었는데요. - 소문이요? I heard rumor. - Rumor? 듣기 View video B.A.P : [MATO TV ON-AIR] B.A.P Him Chan & Young Jae & Jong Up - THE MUSIC SHOW
제가 언뜻 보이는 거겠죠? 감사합니다. You can see me, right? Thank you. 듣기 View video V MOVIE : 심은경, 박주희와 함께 <걷기왕> 스팟라이브 ' Spot Live'
vlive.english: You can see me, right? Thank you.

examples.korean: He glimpsed something on the edge of his vision. 발음듣기 그는 눈 한쪽 귀퉁이로 무엇을 언뜻 본 것 같았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He glimpsed something on the edge of his vision. 발음

examples.korean: He caught a glimpse of her in the crowd. 발음듣기 그는 군중 속에 있는 그녀를 언뜻 보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He caught a glimpse of her in the crowd. 발음

examples.korean: A smile touched the corners of his mouth. 발음듣기 그의 입가에 미소가 언뜻 스쳤다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A smile touched the corners of his mouth. 발음

examples.korean: She caught sight of a car in the distance. 발음듣기 그녀가 멀리서 승용차 한 대를 언뜻 보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She caught sight of a car in the distance. 발음

examples.korean: an apparently motiveless murder/attack 발음듣기 언뜻 보기에 동기가 없는 것 같은 살인/공격 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
